member.name: T:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.AnimationLevel
member.summary: Determines when map navigation is animated.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.AnimationLevel.Full
member.summary: Map navigation is always animated.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.AnimationLevel.None
member.summary: The map navigates to a new view by snapping to it instead of using animation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.AnimationLevel.UserInput
member.summary: Map navigation is only animated in response to user input.

member.summary: Defines the base class for a map mode. This class must be inherited.To use the new enhanced road map style, be sure to load the configuration file before you call InitializeComponent as described in the Loading the Enhanced Road Map Style topic.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.MapMode.InertiaDeceleration
member.summary: Gets or sets the rate of deceleration of the inertia animation effect. Valid values are from 0 to 1, where 0 indicates no inertia effect and 1 indicates the inertia effect does not slow down or stop.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ModeBackground.Dark
member.summary: The background is more typically dark (black).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ModeBackground.Light
member.summary: The background is more typically light (white).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ProjectedPoint
member.summary: This class is reserved for future use.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ProjectionUpdateLevel
member.summary: Contains projection update levels based on the difference between and .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ProjectionUpdateLevel.Full
member.summary: and return different results. For example, this occurs when the zoom level or bird's eye scene is changed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ProjectionUpdateLevel.Linear
member.summary: and return different results, but the points stay at the same location relative to each other. For example, this occurs if you pan the map in Road view but do not change the zoom level.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Maps.MapControl.Core.ProjectionUpdateLevel.None
member.summary: The and return the same results.
